items.title: Localcast radio @ Systo festival
items.content_html:
The main message is aimed at strengthening the connection between musical genres, collectives and listeners with the general festival medium. Having few audio streams in real time, without latency (because the radio is analog), there is a unique opportunity to mix the sounding compositions performed right now on stages distant from each other. In the era of eclecticism, when everything is a reworked and merged of more and more complex concepts, mixing further strengthen, perhaps exponentially, this moment, but already in a unit of time of the present, and not afterwards with recordings and listening ten times.

It also resolves the ordinary wish to know what music is playing on interested stage in any spot of a big festival. We had 4 radio transmitters installed on the stages, 100 simple oldschool receivers that was rented out to festival visitors and FAQ how to tune android to catch up radio.
Besides, we had our own spot where we had sound system and mixer to mix music from all stages.

26 hours mix Youtube playlist with my generative visuals:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_7GTgQB17b4_qJks2HlK2r7q1elaqV-d

items.title: Google Data Studio
items.content_html:
Google Data Studio #

Today we will talk about other tools that are available via Google Marketing Platform, the capabilities of which are available to our clients. Let’s look at Google Data Studio, an online tool for transforming data into customizable, informative reports and dashboards.

GDS saves marketers time by collecting data from Google Analytics tables and other sources into a single report. With Data Studio you can

  • customize the display and style of elements
  • work with both desktop and mobile browsers
  • make multi-page reports
  • configure filters
  • store reports in the cloud
  • view the history of changes in reports for different periods.

The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources. Albert Einstein

Google Data Studio #

Today we will talk about other tools that are available via Google Marketing Platform, the capabilities of which are available to our clients. Let’s look at Google Data Studio, an online tool for transforming data into customizable, informative reports and dashboards.

items.title: Initiation Ritual @ Wild Jam 50
items.content_html:
Extremely spontaneous decision to assemble a team just for 1 week to learn Godot engine and to get the playable game.
I set a goal to achieve visual specific atmoshpere of ancientry with concave projecting rock paintings to the relief stone wall; immersive natural camera motion like somebody really sitting in front of the wall; distinct moon and sun light; fog, smoke, crickets particle systems. And ofcause audio effects different in atmosphere and mood in scenes.

2nd and 4th place in Graphics and Audio charts, 9th overall.

https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-50/rate/1758927
https://de-studio.itch.io/initiation-ritual Play in browser.

items.title: Aurora Wind
items.content_html:
The ever-rushing stream of fluctuations refracts against matter, reluctantly gives it shape and provokes more and more new outbreaks of discoveries. Just like the solar wind, penetrating through the earth’s magnetosphere, it modifies the DNA of all livings, and with all its greatness it dominates the chance.
Inspired by nothern lights (aurora borealis) on a recent trip to Iceland.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vh67zR7kFmA

Part of Lisokot's audiovisual performance with Ildar Yakubov at Holoseum, Tbilisi, Georgia.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K_epeRmAPd0

Also adventitiously presented at the first ambient part of RASKAT festival with Ildar Yakubov and HexagonTau.
Dust club, Tbilisi, Georgia.

items.title: Tato @ Scape.union
items.content_html:
Familiar forms of Baratashvili bridge insides blended with curious gameplay in audio reactive lights and forms. The idea was to immerse player to the same place that is around him. Interactive grabbable objects keep some secrets to get higher.

Scape.union in Tbilisi Tato bridge (Monkey radio) space

items.title: Physarum WebGL
items.content_html:
Play with it here: https://vladpavlov.xyz/physarum/

"Physarum polycephalum, an acellular slime mold or myxomycete popularly known as "the blob", is a protist with diverse cellular forms and broad geographic distribution." (wikipedia)

I didn't find any performant realisation of this algorithm in web environment on CPU, not to mention on the GPU. So I decided to experiment with my own vision of it directly with GLSL and simulated compute shading on WebGL which doesn't support it for now.
And ofcause it's audio-reactive! So you can try it with any music when you allow your mic to listen to it. In this 1st iteration audio affects the speed of particles.

Presented in a lecture format at the "3D NIGHT" @ F0RTHSP4CE, Tbilisi
https://t.me/tbilisi_3d_night/1329
https://f0rth.space/

TODO:

  • Use video
  • Adjustable noise for pheramones

items.title: Toys and surveillance @ NO W
items.content_html:
Charity project. Interactive installation of “Toys and Surveillance” at an anti-war exhibition "NO W".

The general message of the exhibition is to use simple symbols and to name things by theirs names. I have long wanted to speak out about toy tanks, since in childhood there were a lot of them and are now extremely popular computer games in war, both among adults and children. In my installation, the tanks move randomly, each of them is unprincipled and without communication with each other, like a swarming swarm on the piles of bodies. Observation comes from a certain person, which is constantly looking at one or the other, as an overseer with a flashlight. At such a moment, everything freezes and trembles in anticipation. Anyone who approaches the installation, focuses on this attention and manifests itself in a silhouette in the light of this red lantern, is in place “between” a meaningless battles and those who passionately oversees and manage.

Techs: kinect, projector

NO W exhibition
https://www.instagram.com/no.w_foundation/
in Tbilisi Revolution space
https://www.instagram.com/revolution_tbi/

items.title: RxTx
items.content_html:
TXRX (short for receive/transmit) is a series of installations that anticipate the exchange of information with other forms of life in the universe as a way to overcome technological collapse.

In an era of technological explosion, where the existence of our civilization is threatened, compelling arguments can be made for technological development aimed at balanced prosperity in each specific environment. Techno-diversity, in terms of installation and performance, is achieved through eco-positive technologies such as LEDs, lasers, rechargeable electricity, and the broadcast of a sound accompaniment for personal listening at low, environmentally-friendly volumes, at a justified distance from the point of composition.

The abandoned architecture of the industrial era (in the case of the first site - a hydroelectric power station in the middle of the mountains) is subject to being rethought for new uses and repurposing.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by ildar iakubov (@videoildar)

items.title: Hexucinatory @ DigitalDetox
items.content_html:
This is a space of disembodiment, a space that is pending for the observer's presence to use visitors behaviour as an input. Deprivation room controlled by person position and behaviour inside. The installation setting at space is the hexagonal mirror room which is multiplying generative visuals and leads to infinite projection of internal psycho reflections.

Techs: kinect, 2 projectors, touchdesigner, ableton

Digital Detox exhibition (see below)
https://www.instagram.com/digitaldetox.click/
in Tbilisi Holoseum space
https://www.instagram.com/holoseumarts/ https://www.facebook.com/holoseum/


When it's pending it works like a black'n'white kaleidoscope of never repeating l-patterns personifying night starry universe's depth attracting to its fundamentals, pacifying melodic drone sounds.
As we move forward it dissolves to delicious β-rhythm pulsation that leaves flowing down traces on the screen. Depends on where person moves to drone gives or takes way to MRI machine glitch as though you penetrate through layers of the mind.
Further happenes the phase of transition to movement illusions reinforced by hexagonal forms. Eventually a human meets something like a galaxy essence that speaks with the granulary modified raven voice. Metallic wireframe like a bodily bolide opens the way for mind and repeats swayings.
All parameters mostly are not linear and modulated by kinect and other wandering parameters, it creates a more unique experience. Movement direction affects mood and sometimes leads you moving here and there, watching what's happening differently. It immerses deeper and deeper into deprivated state where you balance between sleep phases.

TV reportage on Georgian TV

Posted on official @touchdesigner channel
https://www.instagram.com/p/CwP1Bp4r-T7/



Digital Detox #

Digital technologies allow to create breathtaking imaginary environments that help us look at ourselves from different perspective, question some rigid patterns of our perception.
Following that intention our team https://kargat.studio have invited some talent georgian artists to speak out in their works within this concept and crafted 8 multimedia artworks at the biggest commercial digital art space in Tbilisi, Georgia.
